name: CrackBlocks 2
description:
CrackBlocks 2 is the combination of CrackBlocks and a classic falling blocks game. CrackBlocks 2 provides a larger map in a new design, an innovative relax mode, an enhanced push mode, and new challenging missions.

* Features
- Classic & Mission mode
- 3 different kinds of classic game types (Relax, Push and Mine)
- 3 different levels of difficulty (Easy, Medium, and Hard)
- Local and online highscore
- Multiplayer games via Bluetooth and Wi-Fi
- Multiplayer games support up to 4 players
- Mods to modify the gameplay
- Retina display support
